diseases.method: Do not enter a plague area; if plague occurs where you are, do not flee; maintain hygiene and spiritual practices
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — Section on Plague; Hadiths recorded in Bukhari & Muslim. Also referenced in Tib-e-Nabvi.
diseases.remedy_description: Spiritual measures include Quran recitation and prayer; the Quran is a bound holy book often shown with rich bindings and Arabic script. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Quran

diseases.remedy: Hygiene, limited contact, faith and appropriate care
diseases.method: Limit unnecessary contact, maintain hygiene, care for sick while protecting oneself appropriately
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — sections on contagion
diseases.remedy_description: Limited contact and hygiene are emphasized to prevent contagion; handwashing images are common depictions of such practices. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Handwashing
